alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 7:46PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson and southern Orange Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 746 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orangefield, or near Bridge City. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Vidor, Bridge City, West Orange, Pinehurst, and Orangefield. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 879 and 866. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Orange
